game.name: Black Holeio
game.description:
Are you ready to escape in a world where your eating habit will only help you to survive? We have introduced you today a brand new adventure puzzle where you have to eat every world objects, including buildings, cars, humans and more. Your successful escape will only be accomplished if you will keep eating and gain a size that is bigger than your enemy black hole. It is not going to be easy at all as your enemy will keep chasing you regularly. 
Black Hole.io is a wonderfully-designed escaping game where you play the role of a black hole with immense appetite. Your eating habit will also help you expand more and get ready to challenge the other holes by entering the io arena. No need to stop until you becomes the biggest hole in the town in this cool adventure game. Your survival will depend on the eating of your opponents. Enter the area and begin swallowing all things you see on the screen in this HTML5 strategy game!
Remember if your small size can make you a prey to the big-sized holes. It is easy to devour humans, cars, buildings into the black holes. Put your escaping and swallowing skills to challenge to eat everything in the city! Swallow the obstacles and swallow up the pressure to become the biggest hole in your area in this runaway mobile game! Good luck to explore more escape games for free on atmegame.com where unlimited fun and thrilling possibilities are waiting for you!

game.webControlKeys: KEEP PRESS AND MOVE THE BLACK TO MOVE
